name: HYADES Celestial Buddies - Volume 1
description:
HEADS UP!

This game is best enjoyed after completing the demo of HYADES, which you can find at https://majimjam.itch.io/hyadesrpg. After all, it's hard to get to know your friends a little better if you haven't met them yet!

HYADES Celestial Buddies is a spinoff visual novel miniseries romping through the vast urban city of Hyades to try and get to know its inhabitants better! Make new friends and grow closer with familiar ones as you have all sorts of adventures and scenarios to explore with them.

Volume 1 stars Ruth Crocuta and Anise Hircus as you play as Marsh Arctos, hosting his very first sleepover! With popcorn planned, games to be played, and movies to watch, there's no end to the fun in sight for you two!

Granted, you'll need to carefully analyze each friend's needs as you cater for their personal perfect sleepover, but you'll be fiiiiiiiine. Right? What could even go wrong anyway, it's a SLEEPOVER!

FEATURES:
  • Get to know party members from HYADES: Ruth Crocuta the headstrong hyena, and Anise Hircus, the quick-witted goat!
  • 8 possible endings to explore! Some sweet, some... sour.
  • Loads of options and dialogue to explore! Really get to KNOW the nitty-gritty of your friends!
